description: Visions of the Beast was released by Iron Maiden on 2 June 2003 and contains every promotional video through 2001's Rock in Rio.
name: Iron Maiden: Visions of the Beast

original_info.id: Iron Maiden: Visions of the Beast_2003
original_info.name: Iron Maiden: Visions of the Beast

review.name: Yah this ROCKS!!!
review.reviewBody: Iron Maiden is one of the greatest Metal bands of all time, and this collection of videos proves it! You gotta hand it to these guys, before metal became "cool" again with the hipsters (ie: the Darkness), these honorable rockers just kept pumping out what they knew best: METAL!!!! Free of pretension (unlike hipster-metal), they just do what works for them, and it rules. Everything a cool person should be into is covered here: satan, world war II, indians. Yeah, this DVD is great, although the menu is a little over achieving. But, the content rules. Metal rules. Maiden rules.
